name: Soul Garden
description:
You're a little Grim trying to create a beautiful balanced garden by harvesting souls.

Tap WASD or arrow keys to move and harvest souls.

The souls age over time and have different energy requirements to harvest (e.g infants need less energy to harvest than adults) so keep an eye on your stats and pick up green glowing orbs to replenish energy supplies. If you run out of energy, it's game over for Grim.

If you last one minute you'll be taken to your garden to see your newly planted souls. (I did have a whole plan for different ends depending on ratio of souls harvested etc but yknow, jam-time... so for now it's just a breakdown of harvested stats)
